power.title: Caustic Rampart
power.fluff: You spill some liquid and infuse it with energy, creating a defensive wall of acid fumes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You create a zone of acidic fumes until the end of your next turn. The wall can be up to 2 squares high and must rest on a solid surface.
The fumes are difficult terrain, and the squares they cover are lightly obscured.

A creature in the fumes has a -2 penalty to AC and Fortitude. Any creature that starts its turn in the fumes or adjacent to them takes acid damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persist until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Flameburst Armor
power.fluff: You inscribe a fiery rune upon armor or garments, then turn a fire spirit loose on the field of battle as you flare the rune periodically

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: You or one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You infuse the primary target's armor with an elemental fire spirit until the end of the encounter.
While the armor is infused, the primary target gains resist 5 fire and you can use the Bursting Flames attack at-will.

part.range: burst 1 centered on the primary target

section.name: Burst Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each burst target takes fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus and is marked by the primary target.

power.title: Icebound Sigil
power.fluff: By etching an arcane sigil upon a weapon, you infuse it with icy cold, giving it the power to freeze foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One weapon or implement

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, any attack made with the target deals extra cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
The target's wielder can use the following action:

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: The wielder hits an enemy with an attack using the target; This effect ends, and the triggering enemy is immobilized (save ends).
If the triggering attack has the Cold keyword or already slows or immobilizes the triggering enemy, the enemy is restrained (save ends) instead.

power.title: Life-Tapping Darts
power.fluff: You launch magical darts at an ally and a foe, transferring vitaly from the latter to your ally in a golden flash

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and one ally within 10 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains half the temporary hit points.

power.title: Punishing Eye
power.fluff: An arcane construct of an eye appears in the air, revealing your enemies and striking them when they show weakness

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure an arcane eye in a square within range. The eye lasts until the end of the encounter.
Enemies within 3 squares of the eye do not benefit from concealment, and only gain the benefits of concealment from total concealment.

When an ally hits an enemy within 3 squares of the eye with an attack, that enemy takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus after that attack has been resolved.

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the eye up to 3 squares.

power.title: Summon Obedient Servant
power.fluff: You infuse a construct with an elemental animus and then throw it into the fray to aid your allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Medium obedient servant in an unoccupied space within range.
The obedient servant remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the obedient servant is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: War Proxy
power.fluff: You forge an arcane bond between your weapon and your ally, causing attacks to spring forth from small portals that appear over your ally

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One ranged weapon you are holding, and one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, if the primary target ally is within 10 squares of you, you can make ranged Weapon attacks using the primary target weapon using the primary target ally's space as the origin square for those attacks.
You make the secondary attack, using the primary target ally's space as the origin square.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
